extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for Borderlands 2 on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.. All 70 Trophies included. This includes the Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty DLC, Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage, Sir Hammerlock's Big Game Hunt Trophies and Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep. Descriptions for all 70 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with 2K Games or Gearbox Software.

reviews.title: Blizzmic
reviews.comment: Borderlands 2 isn\'t out yet, however I can see how this app will come in handy, very recommended
reviews.author: A Google User
